name: Relgiros
description:
RELGIROS, a plateform game, tests your patience and determination as it paces up surmounting obstacles, to boost you with the adrenaline rush.
Through the game, the protagonist breezes through obstacles and traps, with a goal to prove worthy of the foresighted critical missions.
Without possible saves, Relgiros will have to be strong with a couple of checkpoints to assist him.
Will you dare take up the challenge staying calm through this exhilirating thrill ?
